text: A Beautiful Mind may refer to: * A Beautiful Mind (book), about the life of John Forbes Nash, Jr. ** A Beautiful Mind (film), the 2001 film adaptation of the same title *** A Beautiful Mind (soundtrack), the associated soundtrack album * A Beautiful Mind (TV series), Korean series starring Jang Hyuk and Park So-dam ==See also== * Beautiful Young Minds, a documentary following a British team of mathematical competitors (on 2006 International Mathematical Olympiad) * Beautiful Minds (disambiguation)
title: A Beautiful Mind
